title: It's literally not possible. There has to be some kind of riot setup. Every time I get into promos..
body:
I can literally go 3-4 solid wins and then get into promos. Then as soon as you hit promos, you get people who literally seem like it is their first ranked game EVER. I mean I go Annie mid vs. Swain and our Irelia is struggling against Riven top. I camp for him, kill riven 3 times and she is 1-4 and I'm 6-0 at this point. He proceeds to then feed her 4 times in a row. MEANWHILE BOT, our Miss Fortune goes 1-13 (THIRTEEN). How is that even POSSSIBLE?!?

I feel like it is set up in the code somewhere that they find people who are absolute feeders, and they put 3-4 of them in with someone in their promos to make them have to attain a tryhard level of over 9000 just to have a chance at winning. It cannot be coincidence that it happens this much.

Oh by the way, that Riven went bonkers and was like 15-6 by the time it was said and done and carried hard.

replies.body: Literally at this point all English speakers might as well give in and agree that "literally" literally means "figuratively".
How do you not have 100 chat restrictions?

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X7cufuA9b_k

Athene has a god point about heartstone, this may be similar to lol
I faced a plat players in my Bronze II promos once.

My diamond promos today were like that. 

Game one, I stomp! 
Game two, I stomp!
Game 3, a challenger smurf with challenger literally IN his name that's like 30-2 on Jarvan. Also a Khazix with one game played on the champ that has a KDA record of 26/3. 
Game 4, AFK! 
Game 5, Bot goes 0-11 in ten minutes. HOW IS THAT POSSIBLE AT DIAMOND LEVEL?! 

Salt level 9000
I laughed pretty hard at 30-2 jarvan that must have sucked
For me its the opposite lately.  Get good teams in promo's, then soon as I advance I get the worst teams imaginable and drop back down in a few matches.
And try warding more. There is no acceptable excuse for having put down four wards in 34 minutes. That's a Bronze-level habit of warding, even if you're mid. You got a trinket, *use it.*

>I feel like it is set up in the code somewhere that they find people who are absolute asshat feeders, and they put 3-4 of them in with someone in their promos to make them have to attain a tryhard level of over 9000 just to have a chance at winning. It cannot be coincidence that it happens this much.

*sighs*

Yes, they clearly planned this from the start. Nobody ever climbs the ladder, everyone stays at bronze forever, despite the fact that there were two teams in your game and someone had to win, but let's disregard that and agree that only your perspective matters and Riot specifically programmed your account to be matched with trolls and feeders while the enemy team gets challenjour.
